translations: n.访问；探视；视察；正式访问

phrs.translation: 马利亚访亲, 访问, 访晤, 临检
恶魔拜访, 与心灵有约, 天罚, 唱片名

sentences.sentence: She is seeking more liberal visitation with her daughter.
sentences.translation: 她正在寻求对女儿更自由的探视权。

sentences.sentence: He was not given any visitation rights by the divorce court.
sentences.translation: 离婚法院没有给予他任何探视权。

sentences.sentence: House-to-house visitation has been carried on, under the regulations of the General Board of Health.
sentences.translation: 根据卫生委员会的规定，挨家挨户的访问持续进行了下去。
